titleStmt.title: Estes Davis to James W. Tate
CWG8035

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Cincinnati July 6. 1863
To the Hon. Jas W. Tate
Asst Sec of State
Dr Sir,
I am in recpt of yr Valued favr of 4th Ist with Instructions & Covy a Commission To take Acknowledgemt of Deeds, &c for the State of Kentucky
And I accordingly beg leave to return to your office my affadavit as Subscribed and Sworn to before the Hon. Alexander Paddock
Probate Judge of Hamilton County Ohio
all of which I trust will prove Satisfactory

I Remain Dear Sir
with distinguished Considerati
Yrs Very truly Estes Davis

Ohio.
Oath of Estes Davis
Comr of Deeds
Recd Aug 7. 1863.
